txt.en: 'My goodness -- this is troubling news. If there were Ghâsh-hai reinforcements at Hadâd-mezer, I can only assume they are also at Ânghumu-ru and Hurmulkezer.\n\n'We must warn the others before it is too late... assuming it is not already too late!'

You found a half-written scroll intended to be delivered to Anazârmekhem clutched in the hand of a slain dwarf. It would be wise to deliver this message yourself to warn the others of the formidable Ghâsh-hai.
Bring the message to Hysing in Anazârmekhem
Anazârmekhem can be found north of Hadâd-mezer in the Flaming Deeps.\n\nYou should deliver the slain dwarf's message warning of the formidable Ghâsh-hai to Anazârmekhem.

You found a half-written scroll intended to be delivered to Anazârmekhem clutched in the hand of a slain dwarf. It would be wise to deliver this message yourself to warn the others of the formidable Ghâsh-hai.\n\nAnazârmekhem can be found north of Hadâd-mezer.
Anazârmekhem can be found north of Hadâd-mezer in the Flaming Deeps.\n\nYou should deliver the slain dwarf's message warning of the formidable Ghâsh-hai to Anazârmekhem.

'My goodness -- this is troubling news. If there were Ghâsh-hai reinforcements at Hadâd-mezer, I can only assume they are also at Ânghumu-ru and Hurmulkezer.\n\n'We must warn the others before it is too late...assuming it is not already too late!'
The hastily written scroll was to be delivered to Anazârmekhem to warn the other groups of the Orc reinforcements.

'Oh dear, this is troubling news. If there were Orc reinforcements at Hadad-mezer, I'm sure they're also at Anghumu-ru and Hurmulkezer. We need to warn the others before it's too late... unless it is already too late.'
Bring the message to Hysing in Anazârmekhem
Deliver the message to Hysing in Anazârmekhem
